789:473: yathā kāmāvacaramanyagatikamapi paripūrakaṃ kuśalamūlamanyatra vipākaṃ prayacchati,
789:479: tattvārthasaṃmūḍhasya puṇyāniṃjyā stattvārtha ucyate catvāryāyaṃ satyāni |
789:480: tatra saṃmohaḥ kuśalacittānāmapyadṛṣṭasatyānāmanuśayato'nubuddho bhavati yadvaśena te duḥkhatastraidhātukasya yathābhūtamaparijñānāt punarbhavahetubhūtān puṇyānijyasaṃskārānutthāpayanti |
789:490: tadyadi tenaiva vittopakaraṇenārthī bhava[ti]tatsvīkaraṇāyābhisaṃskarotyato'sya lobhena prayogo vyavasthāpyate |
789:492: atha parasvīkaraṇe na kaściddoṣa iti mohena prayogo veditavyaḥ |
789:494: anyonyādhipateyamapi karma sādhāraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ yadvaśātsattvā anyonyaṃ citacai ttapariṇāmanimittaṃ bhavantīti ||
789:497: sarva ca kuśalaṃ karma saṃcetanīyaṃ pratipakṣabalikasyākuśalād balavaddraṣṭavyam |
789:499: sarva cāviśeṣeṇa kuśalākuśalaṃ niyatavipākamārya mārgeṇāprahīṇaṃ balavadityucyate |
789:511: tadyathā kṣetrato yadi guṇavaddakṣiṇīyaṃ kṣetraṃ bhavati |
789:512: vastuno yadi praṇītaṃ prabhūtaṃ deyavastu bhavati |
789:514: āśrayataḥ puṇyānāṃ kartā yadi vītarāgo bhavati |
789:518: bahulīkārataḥ yadi paunaḥ punye na kṛtaṃ bhavatyanuvitarkitaṃ vā |
789:519: bāhujanyato yadi svayaṃ ca kṛtaṃ bhavatyanyaiśca kāritamiti ||
789:520: ya evaṃ vadet - yathā yathāyaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacarya vāso na bhavatyavakā śaśca na prajñāyate samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai |
789:523: yadi tadvipākastathaiva sahaduḥkhena sahadaurmanasyenānubhūyeta vṛthā tatparipālanaṃ syāt |
789:524: pāradārikaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca sahasukhena sahasaumanasyena dauḥ śīlyakaraṇādyadi tadvipākastathaivānubhūyeta vṛthā tadviratiḥ syādityevaṃ kṛtvā brahmacaryavāso na bhavati ||
789:527: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko duḥkhasahagatasya duḥkhasahagato 'duḥkhāsukhasahagatasya tatsahagata eveti niyamaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ ||
789:528: atra ya stvevaṃ yathāvedanīyaṃ yathāvedanīyamityevamādinā sukhasahagatasya kuśalākuśalasya yathāyogamāyatyāṃ sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasya sukhādiko vipāko'nujñātaḥ |
789:529: evaṃ duḥkhāduḥkhāsukhasahagatasya sukhādive danīyasya sukhādiko vipāko'nujñāyata iti ||
789:530: pravrajitasya saṃvaraḥ pañcavidho bhikṣusaṃvaro yāvacchāmaṇerīsaṃvara iti |
789:531: sa duścaritavivekacaritaṃ kāmavivekacaritaṃ ca pudgalamadhikṛtya vyavasthāpitaḥ |
789:532: tathāhi sa tādṛśaḥ śaknoti yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātāda brahmacaryācca virantumiti |
789:533: upāsakopāsikāsaṃvaro duścaritaviveka caritamadhikṛtya no tu kāmavivekacaritam |
789:534: ataḥ evāsya yāvajjīvaṃ kāmamithyā cāraviratirvyavasthāpyate nābrahmacaryaviratiriti |
789:535: upavāsasaṃvaro naiva duścarita vivekacaritaṃ na kāmavivekacaritam |
789:540: dhyāna saṃvaro dauḥ śīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ lobhādīnāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśopakleśānā viṣkambhaṇapratipakṣeṇa bījopaghāte sati pradeśa vairāgyeṇāpi kāmebhyo bītarāgasya yā tasmādvauḥ śīlyādviratiḥ |
789:541: yāvattṛtīyadhyānavītarāgasya dūrībhāvapratipakṣeṇa teṣāmeva dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ sularāṃ bījopaghāto veditavyaḥ |
789:543: aurabhrikā ye paśūn hatvā tadvikrayeṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayanti |
789:548: abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato veti tatkulīnasyānyakulīnasya ca yathākramam |
789:550: yathoktasaṃvarāsaṃvaravinirmuktasya dānapriyavacanādikaṃ khaṭacapeṭādikaṃ ca karma navasaṃvaronāsaṃvara ityucyate ||
789:551: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva yadvipacyate |
789:554: yasya tāvadeka mevānantarya tasya tadvipāko'nantaraṃ yuktaḥ,
789:561: yasya tatraiva janmani vipāko vipaktumārabhate taddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam |
789:563: yasyānantaraṃ janma laghayitvārabhate tadaparaparyāyavedanīyami tyevaṃ ca kṛtvā hācittāvadāne - “ ānantaryasya karmaṇo narake punaḥpunaścyutyupapādena vipākapratisaṃvedanam“ - anulomitaṃ bhavatīti ||
789:567: kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ yatkāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ vipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ kuśalākuśalamityarthaḥ |
789:569: nātra pravṛttikṣaṇanaiyamyenocyate tadevobhayamityapi tu sahāśayaprayogeṇaikaṃ karmetyayamatrābhi saṃdhirvedivyaḥ |
789:570: tayośca kṛṣṇaśuklatāṃ pratyanyonyāsādṛśye satyekaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
789:571: tatrāśayataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prayogataḥ śuklaṃ yathāpi kaścitparān vañcayitukāmasteṣāṃ saṃpratyayananimittaṃ bhāvena dānāni dadāti yāvatpravrajatyapi |
789:572: prayogataḥ kṛṣṇamāśayataḥ śuklaṃ yathāpi kaścitputraṃ vā śiṣyaṃ vā'hitānnivārayitukāmo hite ca niyojayitukāmo'nukampācittaḥ kāyena vācāvā paruṣayā tasminkāle saṃkliśyate ||
789:573: akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ karma karmakṣayāya saṃvartate prayogānantarya mārgeṣvanāsravaṃ karma prayogamārgā nantaryamārgāṇāṃ prahāṇapratipakṣatvāt |
789:577: karmakṣayāya saṃvartate'syaiva kṛṣṇādikasya trividhasya sāsravasya karmaṇastenānāstraveṇa karmaṇā vipākadānavāsanāsamudghātāt ||
789:578: aviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasyānāsravasya karmaṇaḥ paripanthamānukūlyaṃ svabhāva madhikṛtya vaṃkadoṣakaṣāyāṇāṃ śauceyānāṃ mauneyānāṃ ca yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
789:580: doṣo yena kāyādikarmaṇā dūṣite saṃtāne tattādṛśamāvaraṇabhūtaṃ karmotpadyate |
789:588: mauneyāni śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ yadanāsravaṃ kāyavāṅmanaḥkarma munīnāṃ tatkarmeti kṛtvā |
789:589: dānasaṃpadamadhikṛtya dānaṃ dātā bhaviṣyatītya nenābhīkṣṇadānatāṃ darśayati,
789:595: muktyāgaḥ pratatapāṇirvyavasargarato yāyajūkastyāgasaṃpanno dāna saṃvibhāgarata ityebhiḥ padairyathākramamaniśritadānatādayo veditavyāḥ |
789:610: mokṣaṃ prati yaḥ saṃvaraḥ sa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ |
789:614: pañca bhikṣoragocarāḥ - ghoṣo veśaḥ pānāgāraṃ rājakulaṃ caṇḍālakaṭhinameva pañcamam |
789:615: prajñaptisāvadyeṣvapi prakṛtisāvadye ṣviva tīvreṇa gauraveṇa śikṣaṇādaṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu bhayadarśī bhavati |
789:617: ataḥ paraṃ śīlamārabhya yadbhagavatā sūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭaṃ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavatītyevamādi tasyārtha ucyate |
789:618: tatra kāyena vācā saṃvṛto bhavati saṃprajanyaparigṛhītatayā yathanujñātamabhikramapratikramādiṣu buddhipūrva samyagvartanāt |
789:627: pratirūpakāyavāksamudācāro guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu ca nihitamānatayā yathārhamupacaraṇāt |
789:631: avipratisārakāyavāksamudācāraḥ kuśalapakṣamā rabhyālpamātreṇāsaṃtuṣṭasyā vipratisāritayā yāvacchakyaṃ saṃpādanāt ||
789:636: karmāṇi dāyāya eṣāṃ ta ime karmadāyādāḥ |
789:638: tasyāṃ svayaṃkṛtavipākapratisaṃvedanāyāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmanyonyadāyā datāmupādāya yathāsvami ṣṭāniṣṭaphalasaṃvibhajanāt |
789:639: te punaḥ svakṛtakarmeṣṭāniṣṭavipākapratisaṃvedinaḥ sattvāḥ kuta āditaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ kimahetukā āhosvit prakṛtīśvarādihetukā ityāha karmayonīyāḥ |
789:643: yaduktamacintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka iti na sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ [a] sāvacintyo veditavyaḥ |
789:647: anena karmaṇā sattvānāmātmabhāvasya varṇasaṃsthānā di prakārabhedavaicitryamityacintyaḥ,
789:650: [tatra sthānaṃ] yatra pradeśe sthitvā yatkarma kṛtvā grāme vā nagare vetyādi |
789:655: kīdṛśena khalu karmaṇā kaṇṭakādīnāṃ taikṣṇādikaṃ kṛtamiti lokacintā nantarbhūtatvāt |
789:665: tadyathā āyurvaśitayā bodhisattvā āyuḥsaṃskārānadhiṣṭhā ya yāvadicchanti tiṣṭhanti |
789:666: cittavaśitayā yathecchaṃ samādhīn samāpadyante pariṣkāravaśitayā 'prameyamanardheyamupakaraṇavarṣa sattvānāṃ varṣanti |
789:668: upapatti vaśitayā dhyā nairapi vihṛtyāparihīṇā eva kāmadhātāvupapadyante |
789:673: dharmavaśitayā yathārha yāvat sarvasatvānāmanyānyairnāmapadavyaṃjanakāryaḥ sūtrādīn dharmān vyavasthāpya yugapaccittaparitoṣaṇe samarthā bhavantīti ||
789:676: anābhogapratigatā dharmadhātvekarasatāprāptā sarve buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ yathā yadā yāvatkṛtyamanuṣṭhātavyaṃ tatsarvamanutiṣṭhanti evaṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣayo'cintyaḥ ||
789:678: upacitavāsanānāṃ sattvanāṃ devādisatvanikāye tadākṛtiprakṛtisādṛśyena samasyodayasya kāraṇamiti samudayam |
789:679: pratyātmaṃsaṃtānanaiyabhyena gatiyonyādisarvaprakāraiḥ prakarṣaṇa yāvadbhavāgragatasyodbhavasya kāraṇamiti prabhavaḥ |
789:680: apūrva syānyasyātmabhāvasya prāptau pūrvātmabhāvātyayena kāraṇamiti pratyayaḥ ||
789:704: tadubhayavisaṃyoge punaḥ satyāyatyāṃ ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate,
789:708: atastatphalabhūtasya duḥkhasya prahāṇamadhikṛtyāha - nirodho vyupaśama iti |
789:709: pūrvakarma kleśasamudāgatānāṃ tu sattvānāṃ svarasenaivoparama[ma]dhikṛtyāha - astaṃgama iti |
789:733: dukhaṃ hi tatra tatra sattva nikāye pratisaṃdhibandhena jāyate |
789:736: tacca vartamānaṃ duḥkhaṃ karmakleśānāṃ cānyabhavasaṃskaraṇe padasthānaṃ bhavati |
789:743: apunarāvartanāt kṣematvācca yathākramaṃ hitaṃ kuśalamiti śakyatvāt ||
789:748: tatra saṃbhāramārgaḥ śīlādiko yasya paripūrṇatvādu ṣmagatādyānupūrvyā satyadarśanāya tadāvaraṇaprahāṇāya ca saṃtānasya yogyatāṃ pratilabhata iti |
789:750: uṣmagataṃ pratyātmaṃ satyeṣvālokalabdhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā sasaṃyoga iti samāhitena cittena satyādhipateyasya sūtrādikasya dharmasya manojalpasya mukhairarthasaṃprakhyāne sati śamathaśca vipaśyanā coṣmagatamiti veditavyam ||
789:767: tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ prayogamārge duḥkhasatyādhikārikasūtrādidharmavicāraṇājñānaṃ yoniśo manaskārasaṃgṛhītamadhipati kṛtvā svasaṃtānikaduḥkhasatye tattathatāpratyakṣānubhāvino lokottarā prajñā samyagdṛṣṭisvabhāvotpadyate yayā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyāṃstraidhātukānaṣṭāviṃśatimanuśayān prajahāti |
789:769: tayā kṣāntyā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyakleśaprahāṇāt parivartita āśraye tadanantaraṃ yena jñānena tāmāśrayaparivṛtti pratyanubhavati tadduḥkhe dharmajñānamityucyate |
789:772: atastadālaṃbyānvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇāmiti pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinyanāstravā prajñā duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣānti |
789:774: lokottarasya hi mārgasya dvayaṃ viṣayaḥ - tathatā samyagjñānaṃ ca |
789:779: yo bhagavatā ṣaṣṭho'[ni]mittavihārī pudgala ākhyātaḥ sa eteṣu kṣāntijñāneṣu vartamāno veditavyaḥ,
789:781: ta ete kṣānti [jñāna] saṃgṛhītāḥ ṣoḍaśa cittakṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ,
789:783: na cātra bhāvasyābhatvā prādurbhāvamātraṃ cittakṣaṇo veditavyaḥ |
789:784: kiṃ tarhi yāvatā jñeye jñānātpatteḥ parisamāptirbhavati |
789:787: yaccaitaddarśanamārgamārabhya vistareṇa vipaṃcittaṃ vyavasthānamātraṃ tatsarva veditavyam,
789:789: sarvaṃ hi mārgasatyaṃ caturbhiḥ prakārairanugantavyam - vyavasthānato vikalpanato'nubhavataḥ paripūritaśca |
789:791: yathāsvamadhigamaniṣṭhāprāptā śrāvakādayastatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena pareṣāṃ prāpaṇanimittaṃ nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ mārgasatyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
789:794: abhisamayaprayuktā laukikena yathāvyavasthānaṃ vikalpayato yadabhyasya nti |
789:796: tathābhyasyanto yāmādito darśanamārgākhyāṃ lokottarāṃ niṣprapañcāvasthāṃ pratyātmamanubhavanti paripūritaḥ tadūrdhva yāmāśrayaparivṛttiṃ paripūrya [yā] vadadhigamaniṣṭhāṃ prāpnuvanti |
789:798: ityevamādi tacca [tu]rākāraṃ mārgacakraṃ punaḥ punaranyonyāśrayeṇa pravartata iti veditavyam ||
789:799: yaduktaṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpadyata iti taddarśanamārgamadhikṛtyoktam,
789:805: punaranayoreva kṣāntijñānāvasthayoryathākramaṃ parijñayā prahāṇena ca mārgasya viśuddhatāmadhikṛtya virajo vigatamalaṃ veditavyam ||
789:817: lokottareṇa mārgeṇa phalādhigame sati dīrgharātramabhikāṃkṣite svādhigame'saṃdehāt |
789:819: parādhigame tadavasthasyā nyeṣāmapi viśeṣādhigamaṃ prati vimatyabhāvāt |
789:825: te punardhyānārūpyāḥ saṃkleśato vyavadānato vyavasthānato viśuddhitaśca veditavyāḥ ||
789:836: tattvā prativedhena mokṣakāmasya tasminvi śeṣādhigame mokṣo na mokṣa iti vicikitsotpādanāt ||
789:838: śuddhakā dhyānārūpyā laukikā api kuśalatvātparya vasthānamalāpagatatvena vyavadātā ityucyante ||
789:854: prītisukhe cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṅge pūrvavat |
789:855: tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaśca pratipakṣāṅgam ,
789:857: sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṅge yathākramam |
789:862: kathaṃ punaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya sapta manaskārā bhavanti |
789:867: tadurdhva śrutaṃ cintāṃ cātikramyaikāntena bhāvanākāreṇa tadaudārikaśāntalakṣaṇanimittālaṃbanāṃ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayan punaḥ punaryathāparyeṣitā maudārikaśāntatāmadhimucyate ityayama dhimokṣikaḥ |
789:870: sa yogī tadūrdhva prahāṇārāmo bhavati prahāṇe 'nuśaṃsadarśī parīttapravivekaprītisukhasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ kālena kālaṃ prasadanīyena manaskāreṇa saṃpraharṣayati yāvadeva styānamiddhauddhatyopaśamāya |
789:872: tasyaivaṃ samyakprayuktasya kuśalapakṣaprayogopastabdhatvāt kāmāvacarakleśaparyavasthānāsamudācāre sati tatprahīṇāprahīṇatāvagamārtha tadutpattyanukūlaśubhanimittamanaskāreṇa pratyavekṣaṇaṃ mīmāṃsāmanaskāraḥ |
789:873: tasyaivaṃ mīmāṃsāpratipakṣaṃ bhāvayataḥ tāvatkālikayogena sarvakāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogāya prathamadhyānaprayogaparyavasānagataḥ pratipakṣamanaskāraḥ prayoganiṣṭhaḥ |
789:875: tatra lakṣaṇapratisavedinā prahātavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ ca samyakparijñāya prahāṇāya prāptaye ca cittaṃ praṇighatte |
789:881: prayoganiṣṭhāphalena eṣāṃ manaskārāṇāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati |
789:882: yathā prathamadhyāna samāpattaye sapta manaskārā evaṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyāḥ |
789:883: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvāsvadhobhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyam - duḥkhataravihāritā'praśāntavihāritayā,
789:887: tadyathā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaṃ ityevamādi yathāpūrvamuktam |
789:891: saṃjñākaraṇavyavasthānaṃ caturthadhyānaprabhedā nāṃ samādhīnāmasaṃkhyeyānyacintyāni ca nāmāni |
789:892: tathāhi yāvataḥ prathamadhyānasaṃgṛhītān samādhīn buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca mahāprabhāvaprāptāḥ samāpadyante,
789:893: teṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāśca nāmānyapi na jānanti |
789:900: lokottaramārgo bhāvanāmārge'ṣṭau duḥkhā[didharmā] nvayajñānāni yathā darśanamārge nirdiṣṭāni |
789:903: ata eva ca tatsaṃjñāmāndyādālambanā nimittīkaraṇārthenānimitta mityucyate |
789:904: kutaḥ punaretat jñāyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane āryamārgo nāstīti |
789:909: pūrvotpāditāyāḥ paścātsaṃmukhobhāvo manuṣyeṣu vā tasminneva janmani rūpadhātau vā upapadya |
789:912: ata evātra catuṣkoṭikaṃ bhavati - yo rūpavītarāgaḥ sarvaḥ sa ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā,
789:913: yo vā ārūpya śāntavimokṣasamāpattā sarvaḥ sa rūpavītarāga iti |
789:915: dvitīyā koṭiḥ - caturthadhyānalābhī ārya āryo papattyā'narthī prahāṇamārga nirākṛtya viśeṣamārga niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā |
789:916: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ - sa eva vairāgyārthī prahāṇamārga niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā |
789:919: śāntena vihāreṇa vihartukāmā āryā manuṣyeṣvenāmabhinirhṛtya saṃmukhīkurvanti |
789:920: ārūpyeṣu tūpapannāste'praya tnenaiva vaipākikaiḥ paramaśāntaiḥ vimokṣavihārairviharantītyatastatsaṃmukhīkaraṇārtha na punaḥ prayatnamārabhanta iti ||
789:921: mṛdumadhyādhimātro mārgaḥ pratyekaṃ punaḥ mṛdvādibhistribhiḥ prakārairbhittvā navaprakāro vyavasthāpyate,
789:923: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mṛdumṛdunā mārgeṇādhimātraḥ kleśaḥ prahīyate |
789:924: sa hyatyarthaḥ vipannahrīvyapannāpyā lajjinaḥ saṃtāne samudācarati sūpalakṣaścāsau suparicchedastasmādasau sthūlamalavadalpenā pi pratipakṣeṇāpanīyate |
789:925: yastvayaṃ duṣparicchedasamudācāraḥ sūkṣmalīnaḥ saṃtāne mṛdumṛdukleśaḥ sūkṣmamalavanmahatā pratipakṣabale nāpanīyata ityado vipakṣaprakāraviparyayeṇa pratipakṣaprakāravyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
789:926: prayogamārgo yena mārgeṇa bhāvyamānena pratyekamadhimātrādhimātrādikleśaprakārādijātipakṣasya dauṣṭhulyāṅgasyāpagamātkrameṇāśrayaḥ parivartate sa bhāvanāmārge prayogamārge ityucyate ||
789:927: yasya tvanantaraṃ tatprakārakleśajātitatpakṣadauṣṭhulyā vaśeṣāpagamāttena dauṣṭhulyena nirdauṭhulya āśrayaḥ parivartate sa ānantaryamārgaḥ ||
789:930: aparaḥ paryāya'viśeṣamārga stasya kleśaprahāṇaprayogamadhyupekṣya sūtrādīn dharmāścintayataḥ,
789:931: pūrvacintitādhigatadharmapratyavekṣaṇāvihāreṇa vā viharataḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya yo mārgaḥ |
789:932: punarabhijñādīn vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharatastairvā viharato yo mārgaḥ ||
789:933: ityevaṃ bhāvanāmārga vistareṇa nirdiśya tadanuṣaṃgeṇa mārgabhāvanā varṇyate |
789:943: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāṃ sthāpayati[sā]dhāsanā pratilambhabhāvanā,
789:948: punaḥ pratipakṣasya vidūṣaṇādikaḥ caturvidhaḥ prabhedo veditavyaḥ |
789:974: tatra duḥkhā pratipadanā gamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndyāt |
789:991: punarbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam - ālambanataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyato bhāvanāto bhāvanāphalataśca ||
789:992: tatra smṛtyupasthānānāmālaṃbanaṃ yathākramaṃ kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ |
789:994: yasmādviparyastabuddhayo bālāḥ prāyeṇa sendriyaṃ kāyamāśritya sukhādimupabhuñjānā upalabdha lakṣaṇā ātmarāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti vikalpayantyata āditaḥ samyaktadvastulakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamevaṃ caturdhālambanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
789:1007: kāye kāyasya sādṛśyena paśyanā kāye kāyānupaśyanā,
789:1009: adhyātmaṃ vedanādayo'dhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannāḥ cakṣurādyālaṃbanatayā svāśrayotpannanatayā vā |
789:1016: alpamātrasaṃtuṣṭiḥ alaṃ me tāvatā kuśalapakṣeṇeti prativāraṇam |
789:1018: nikṣiptadhuratā pramādadoṣeṇa yathārambhaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayogāntā nirvāha iti ||
789:1027: tathāhi tatpratipakṣabhūtā prastrabdhiḥ kāya eva viśeṣeṇotpadyata iti |
789:1031: nirātmakaṃ vijñānamātraṃ na bhaviṣyatīti paśyata ātmocchedāśaṅkāmukhena nirvāṇottrāsābhāvāt |
789:1044: yadā śamathādinimittamanaskāreṇa nirapekṣālaṃbanaṃ kevalaṃ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati tadā vyāyaccjhata ityucyate |
789:1045: yadā tulayopakleśe utpanne tadapakarṣaṇārtha prasadanīyādimanaskāraiḥ cittamunnāmayati,
789:1046: auddhatyopakleśe cotpanne pratyāsaṃkṣepamukhena cittaṃ dhārayati tadā vīryamārabhata ityucyate |
789:1055: chandasamādhiryat satkṛtyaprayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ tīvreṇa chandena tīvre ṇādareṇa prayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayoga iti kṛtvā |
789:1057: tadvīryamityucyate yannityaṃ prayujyata eva na kadācinna prayujyate |
789:1058: cittasamādhiryatpūrvajanmāntare samādhibhāvanāmāgamyatatparipuṣṭabījatvāccittasya svarasena samādhyanukūla pariṇāme sati spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām |
789:1059: api khalu ṛddhipādābhinirhārayornidarśanārthameva samyakprahāṇabhāvanāyāṃ chandaṃ janayatītyevamādinirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
789:1060: cittaṃ pradadhāti pragṛhṇātītyeṣā cātra pāṭhānupūrvī veditavyā |
789:1061: tatra cittasamādhiryaccitaṃ pradadhat spṛśatīti pratyātmaṃ cittameva cittaṃ dhārayan śamayannabhisaṃkṣipa nnadhigacchatītyarthaḥ |
789:1068: tathāhi yo yenārthī bhavati tatprāptyartha vyāyacchate |
789:1084: etacca yathā kramamadhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā - naca me chando'tilīno bhaviṣyati,
789:1088: vivṛtena cetasā'paryavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me'ndhakārāyattatvaṃ bhaviṣyati cetasa iti |
789:1092: phalaṃ tadādhipatyādacireṇa kālena darśanamārgasyotpādaḥ tasminneva ca kāle nirvedhabhāgīyabhajanaṃ ca saṃtānasya ||
789:1095: tathāhyeṣāṃ tacca yathoktam - āśradvyādivipakṣanirlekhaścādhika ityata evaiṣāṃ tulyānāmālaṃvanasvabhāvādikānāmapyanavamṛdyatārthaviśeṣeṇa bodhipakṣāntaratvam ||
789:1113: bhāvanā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritamityevamādirebhiḥ caturbhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ catuḥsatyā laṃbanā bodhyaṅgabhāvanā paridīpitā |
789:1114: tathāhi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhata ālaṃbamānasya tadvivekānveṣaṇādduḥkhālaṃbanaṃ vivekaniśritamityucyate |
789:1115: tṛṣṇālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhasamudayata ālaṃba mānasya tadvirāgānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ virāganiśritam |
789:1116: duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhata ālaṃba mānasya tatsākṣātkaraṇānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ nirodhaniśritam |
789:1122: mārgāṅgānāmālaṃbanaṃ darśanamārgāduttarakālaṃ saiva yathādṛṣṭānāṃ satyānāṃ yathābhūtatā |
789:1131: samyakkarmāntenābhikramapratikramādiṣu saṃpannacāritratayā śīlaviśuddhiḥ samyagā jīvena yathānujñaṃ dharmeṇa cīvarādiparyeṣaṇādājīvaviśuddhi riti |
789:1141: pratipadāṃ dharmapadānāṃ ca pūrvavadarthanirdeśo veditavyaḥ dukhā pratipadanāgamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndhāt |
789:1146: tasya cittasyaivamādita upanibaddhasya calasyaudārikasya tasminnevālaṃvane saṃtatiyogena sūkṣmokaraṇena cābhisaṃkṣepaḥ saṃsthāpanā |
789:1148: ādita eva tasya cittasya vahiravisārāyopa sthitasmṛtitopasthāpanā |
789:1149: pūrvameva vikṣepanimitteṣu rūpādiṣvādīnavasaṃjñāmadhipati kṛtvā cittasya prasarādānaṃ damanam |
789:1155: tatra carita viśodhanamālaṃvanaṃ kauśalyālaṃbanaṃ vā kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā yāvadbhāvikatayā vicinoti,
789:1159: api khalu [śamatha]vipaśyanāmāgamya catvāro mārgā iti catvāro mārgopadeśanāmadhikṛtya |
789:1160: tatra prathamaḥ śamathasya lābhitvādabhiniṣīdanneva cittaṃ sthāpayati yāvatsamādhatte,
789:1161: vipaśyānāyā alābhitvāttu samādhi niśritya paścātta thāniṣaṇṇastān dharmānvicinoti yāvatparimīmāṃsā māpadyate |
789:1165: śrutodgrahaṇa mukhena vivaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti tatpūrvakaṃ ca śamathe |
789:1167: ajñātamājñā syāmīndriyaṃ prayogamārge nirvedhabhāgīyasaṃgṛhīte pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam,
789:1178: ūrdhvabhūmike mārge saṃmukhībhāvena bhāvyamāne'saṃmukhībhūtānyapyadhobhūmi kāni kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti,
789:1183: tadyathā sarvatragamabhilāpadauṣṭhulyaṃ yā cakṣurādisarvadharmanāmā bhiniveśavāsanā''layavijñāne saṃniviṣṭā'nādikālānusṛtā,
789:1185: yataścakṣurādayo dharmāḥ sanāmā bhiniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ pravartanta iti |
789:1208: yathoktaṃ - “ tasya cetovimukteḥ pāripūryā prajñāvimukteḥ pāripūryā kāyadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprastrabdheḥ |
789:1209: smṛtyā samanvāgamahetorevamasya prathamaṃ dvāraṃ sudāntaṃ bhavati suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāṣitam,
789:1210: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣvevaṃ yāvanmano vijñeyeṣu dharmeṣvi“ ti ||
789:1212: sa ca samādhirnirantarastatpravāharaya laukikena mārge ṇāntarākhaṇḍanāt |
789:1216: etadarthapratibimbanārtha bhagavatoktam - tadyathā mahāśailaḥ parvato'khaṇḍo'cchidro'śuṣira ekadhanaḥ susaṃvṛta iti ||
789:1221: mārgāśrayaparivṛtiḥ pūrva laukiko mārgo'bhisamayakāle lokottaratvena parivṛtaḥ śaikṣaścocyate sā vaśeṣakaraṇīyatvāt |
789:1222: yadā tu nirhatāśeṣavipakṣo bhavati traidhātukavairāgyāttadāsya mārgasvabhāvasyāśrayasya paripūrṇā parivṛttirvyavasthāpyate |
789:1224: kṣaye sati, viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānaṃ kṣaya jñānametaduktaṃ bhavati |
789:1225: niravaśeṣaṃ prakṣīṇe samudaye yajjñānaṃ tadavasthasya hetunirodhālaṃbanaṃ vā kṣayajñānamiti ||
789:1226: tathānutpāde sati viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānamanutpādajñānam āyatyāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyātyantamanutpattidharmatāyāṃ satyāṃ yajjñānamanyasatyālaṃbanamiti |
789:1242: viparyayeṇa lokottarāḥ supraviṣṭā nirāvaraṇāśca santo nirvikalpatayā laukikebhyo viśiṣyante |
